title: Non-Replicating Malicious Code
overview: Non-replicating malicious code only resides on the target system or software that is attacked; it does not attempt to spread to other systems.
remediation: ::PHASE:Operation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Antivirus software can help mitigate known malicious code.::PHASE:Installation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Verify the integrity of the software that is being installed.::
